generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a curved path, typical of a street.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible on both sides of the road, separated by curbs and trees.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with windows and facades are visible in the background.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves line both sides of the road.
- terrain: Small patches of grass and soil are visible along the sidewalk edges and between trees.
- sky: A small portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy.
- person: Several people are visible walking or standing on the sidewalks and near parked cars.
- car: Several cars, including vans and sedans, are parked along the side of the road.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A stop sign is visible on the left side of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the right side of the road.
